src: أضاف بكلامه وكَال، "عدنا هسه فيران عمرها 4 أشهر، وكانت سابقاً مصابة بمرض السكر، بس هسه تعافت منه.
mt: "We have a four-month-old puppy that was previously diabetic, but she's recovered from that now."
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: نبهنا الدكتور إيهود أور -أستاذ الطب بجامعة دالهوزي بمنطقة هاليفاكس، نوفا سكوتيا ورئيس الشعبة الطبية والعلمية بالجمعية الكندية لأمراض السكري- إن البحث بعده  بمراحله الأولى.
mt: Dr. E. Urbach, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's medical and scientific section, said the study is in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: مثل بعض الخبراء الآخرين هو متشكك من امكانية علاج مرض السكر، مع ملاحظة أنو هذي النتائج ما إلها علاقة بالناس اللي يعانون من السكر من النوع الأول.
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical of the possibility of curing diabetes, noting that these results have nothing to do with people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: يوم الاثنين، كَالت سارة دانيوس -السكرتيرة الدائمية للجنة نوبل للأداب بالأكاديمية السويدية- كَدام الناس خلال برنامج على راديو السويد بالسويد، أنو اللجنة ما كدرت توصل مباشرة لبوب ديلان علمود الفوز بجائزة نوبل للأدب سنة 2016- وتخلت عن جهودها  بالوصول إله.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee, told listeners during a Swedish radio program that the committee had not been able to directly reach Bob Dylan to inform him of his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature win, and had given up on the effort.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: كَالت دانيوس " ما راح نسوي أي شي. أني اتصلت ودزيت رسائل بريد إلكتروني لأقرب المتعاونين وياه وحلصت على ردود كلش لطيفة. هذا  كاببالوقت الحالي طبعاً".
mt: "We're not going to do anything. I've called and emailed the closest collaborators and got nice replies from all of them. This is all for now, though."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: قبل مدة، لاحظ جيمي سيمينوف، الرئيس التنفيذي لشركة Ring، أنو الشركة تأسست لمن ما  كان  جرس بابه مسموع من دكانه اللي صاير بكراج بيته.
mt: Jimmy Siminovitch, Ring's CEO, noticed that the company was founded to solve a problem that was audible doorbells from his neighbor's house.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: كَال إنه صنع جرس للباب يشتغل بتقنية الواي فاي.
mt: He made a doorbell that works with Wi-Fi technology.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: كَال سيمينوف إن المبيعات ارتفعت بعد ما طلع بالتلفزيون سنة2013 بحلقة برنامج شارك تانك، ورفضت لجنة العرض تمويل الشركة البادئة.
mt: As the sales increased after the show was aired in 2013, the show's committee refused to fund the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: بنهاية عام 2017، طلع "سيمينوف" على قناة التسوق التلفزيونية كيو بسي.
mt: 2017, Semenov appeared on the television shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: وقامت رينج بتسوية دعوى قضائية وية شركة الأمن المنافسة، شركة آي دي تي.
mt: Ring settled a lawsuit against its security rival, IDT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: بينما الظاهر أنو أكو  لقاح واحد تجريبي يكَدر يقلل من وفيات الإيبولا، بس لحد الآن، ما لكَو أي عقاقير مناسبة لعلاج العدوى الموجودة.
mt: While there is one experimental vaccine that can reduce deaths from Ebola, there is no approved treatment for the disease.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: كان  أكو  خليط واحد من الأجسام المضادة، وهو ZMapp، وتأملوا بي خير بالبداية بهذا المجال، بس  الدراسات الرسمية  شافت أنو الفائدة المترتبة على هذا الخليط كانت أقل من الفوائد الي المطلوبة حتى يقللون عدد الوفيات.
mt: ZMapp was a cocktail of antibodies, and they hoped for the best in this field, but official studies showed that the benefits of this cocktail were less than the benefits required to reduce the number of deaths.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: بتجربة PALM، استخدموا عقار ZMapp كمعيار مراقبة، بمعنى أن العلماء خلوه  كأساس وقارنوا العلاجات الثلاثة الأخرى بي.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that the scientists removed it as a baseline and compared the other three treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: تدعم هيئة الولايات المتحدة للجمباز رسالة اللجنة الأولمبية الأمريكية وتقبل الحاجة المطلقة للأسرة الأولمبية لتعزيز بيئة آمنة لجميعِ الرياضيين الي عدنا.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports the message of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the urgent need for the Olympic family to enhance a safe environment for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: نتفق وية بيان اللجنة الأولمبية الأمريكية بأنو من الممكن تلبية مصالح الرياضيين والأندية، ورياضتهم، بصورة أفضل عن طريق تغيير حقيقي داخل مؤسستنا، بدل سحب التراخيص.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that we can better serve our athletes and our clubs, and our sport, through real change within our organization, rather than revoking our licenses.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: تدعم هيئة الولايات المتحدة للجمباز تحقيق مستقل ممكن يسلط الضوء على أن وصف الناجين من لاري نصار الإساءة النسبية بشجاعة  كان من الممكن انو ما يكتشوفه لفترة طويلة من دون تبني  أي تغييرات ضرورية ومناسبة.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports an independent investigation that may shed light on how the Nassar survivors' abuse allegations were courageously brought to light long before any necessary and appropriate changes were made.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: هيئة الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية للجمباز واللجنة الأولمبية الأمريكية عدهم  نفس الهدف — وهو أن تصير رياضة الجمباز وغيرها، آمنةً قدر الإمكان للرياضيين  بسبيل تحقيق أحلامهم بالحصول على بيئة آمنة وإيجابية وقوية.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association and the United States Olympic Committee share the same goal — to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible for athletes to achieve their dreams in a safe, positive, and strong environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: و بالستينيات من القرن الماضي، تعين بريجنسكي مستشار لجون إف كينيدي  وبعدها تعين  بإدارة ليندون جونسون.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later as an aide to Lyndon Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: وخلال انتخابات عام 1976،  تعين كمستشار لكارتر للسياسة الخارجية، وراها تعين مستشار للأمن القومي من عام 1977 إلى عام 1981 خلفاً لهنري كيسنجر.
mt: In the 1976 election, he was appointed as Carter's foreign policy adviser, and was later appointed as national security adviser from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: خلال  شغله لمنصب مستشار بالأمن القومي، ساعد كارتر دبلوماسياً بإدارة شؤون العالم مثل اتفاقيات كامب ديفيد عام 1978؛ وفكرة تطبيع العلاقات الأمريكية - الصينية أواخر السبعينيات؛ والثورة الإيرانية اللي أدت إلى أزمة الرهائن الإيرانية عام 1979؛ والاحتلال السوفييتي لأفغانستان عام 1979.
mt: As National Security Advisor, Carter helped diplomatically manage world affairs such as the 1978 Camp David Accords; the idea of normalizing American-Chinese relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution that led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis of 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: وحصل الفلم اللي شاركو بي رايان غوسلينغ وإيما ستون، ترشيحات بجميع الفئات الرئيسية.
mt: The film, which starred Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: حصل جوسلينغ وستون ترشيحات لأفضل ممثل وممثلة على التوالي.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: تشمل الترشيحات الباقية جائزة أفضل فلم ومخرجٍ وتصويرٍ سينمائيٍ وتصميم أزياء ومونتاج وموسيقى تصويرية وتصميم إنتاج وتعديل الصوت ودمج الصوت وسيناريو أصلي.
mt: The remaining nominees are for Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: حصلت أغنيتين من الفلم، تجربة أداء (The Fools Who Dream) وCity of Stars، ترشيحات لأفضل أغنية أصلية. حصل استوديو Lionsgate 26 ترشيح — أكثر من أي استوديو ثاني.
mt: Two songs from the film, "The Fools Who Dream" and "City of Stars," were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: بوقت متأخر من يوم الأحد، أعلن رئيس الولايات المتحدة دونالد ترامب، ببيان ألقاه عن طريق  السكرتير الصحفي، أنو القوات الأميركية راح تطلع من سوريا.
mt: Late Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a statement released through the press secretary that U.S. forces will withdraw from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: تم الإعلان عن الخبر بعد ما أجرى ترامب اتصال هاتبويه الرئيس التركي رجب الطيب أردوغان.
mt: The news was announced after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: وراح تتكفل تركيا بحراسة مقاتلين داعش اللي تم أسرهم، وذكر البيان إن الدول الأوروبية رفضت إستقبالهم.
mt: Turkey is responsible for guarding captured ISIS fighters, and the statement said European countries refused to take them.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: الموضوع ما يأكد بس على أنو قسم من الديناصورات على  أقل تقدير كان عدها ريش، وهي نظرية شائعة بالفعل، بل يتعدى هذا بتقديم تفاصيل تعجز الأحفوريات عن تقديمها بشكل عام، مثل اللون والترتيب ثلاثيّ الأبعاد.
mt: The subject is not so much that some dinosaurs had feathers, which is already a common theory, but that it goes beyond this by presenting details that paleontologists generally cannot provide, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: حسب كلام العلماء أنو ريش هذا الحيوان كان باللون البُني الكستنائي من فوكَ وجانبه الأسفل شاحب أو بنفس لون الكاروتينات.
mt: According to scientists, this bird's feathers were brownish from the back and the underside was pale or the same color as carotenoids.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: يمنح الاكتشاف أيضاً فهم عميق لتطور الريش بالطيور.
mt: The discovery also provides a deep understanding of feather evolution in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: لأن ريش الديناصورات ما يحتوي سلسلة عظمية مكتملة التطور، وتسمى "العمود الفقري"، ولكن تمتلك خصائص ثانية للريش - كالنتوءات والنتوءات الصغرى - استنتج الباحثين  إلى أن العمود الفقري كان على الأرجح نشأة تطورية لاحقة لهذي  الخصائص الأخرى.
mt: Because the dinosaur feathers lacked a complete set of skeletal elements, and possessed other feather characteristics, such as serrations and microserrations, the researchers concluded that the backbone was likely a later evolutionary development.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: حسب الظاهر من بنية الأجنحة  أنه ما تم استخدامها بالطيران بل بتنظيم درجة الحرارة أو للاستعراض. يقترح الباحثين أنه بالرغم من أن هذا  الذيل مال ديناصور زغير إلا أن العينة تظهر ريش بالغ ومو مؤخرة ديناصور زغير.
mt: The researchers suggest that despite the small size of the tail, the specimen shows fully developed feathers and a posterior dinosaur tail.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: أشار الباحثين إلى أنه  بالرغم من أنو هذا الذيل لديناصور زغير، لكن العينة أظهرت ريش طائر بالغ  ومو ديناصور زغير.
mt: The researchers noted that despite the small tail of the dinosaur, the specimen showed adult bird feathers and a small dinosaur.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: انفجرت سيارة مفخخة البارحة الصبح  بمركز شرطة  بمنطقة غازي عنتاب بتركيا، مما إدى الى وفاة ضابطين من الشرطة وإصابة أكثر من عشرين آخرين بجروح.
mt: Yesterday morning, a car bomb exploded at a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: وكَال مكتب المحافظ أن ١٩ من المصابين كانوا من ضباط الشرطة.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: وكَالت الشرطة إنها تشتبه بمسؤولية أحد مقاتلي داعش عن الهجوم.
mt: Police suspect a former ISIS fighter of the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: اكتشفوا أن الشمس تعمل على نفس المبادئ الأساسية للنجوم البقية: و أنو نشاط جميع النجوم  بالنظام يسير من خلال لمعانها ودورانها فقط.
mt: They discovered that the Sun works on the same basic principles as the other stars: that all stars' activity runs through their luminosity and rotation only.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: تستخدم الضيائية والدوران سوة بتعيين رقم روسبي الخاص بالنجم، والمتعلّق بتدفّق البلازما.
mt: The plasma flow is identified by the Doppler shift and rotation of the star's spectral lines, which are related to the star's Rossby number.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: كلّما قل رقم روسبي، كلما يقل نشاط النجم بالنسبة للتقلّبات المغناطيسيّة.
mt: The more you decrease the number of Rosby, the less the star's activity with respect to magnetic fluctuations.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: وخلال  سفرته، واجه إيواساكي مشاكل هواية.
mt: During his trip, Iwazaki faced some problems.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: تعرض للتسليب من قراصنة، وهجم عليه كلب مسعور بالتبت، ونجا من الزواج  بالنيبال، واعتقلوه بالهند.
mt: 1. Stolen by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, survived a plane crash in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: يشتغل معيار 802.11n اللاسلكي على ترددي 2.4 غيغا هيرتز و5.0 غيغا هيرتز
mt: 802.11n operates on 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: تسمح إمكانية عمل المعيار على الترددين أن يكون متوافق ويه معايير سابقة له وتحديداً  معايير 802.11a و802.11b و802.11g بشرط أن تمتلك المحطة الأساسية أجهزة راديو مزدوجة.
mt: The ability to operate on both the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands allows the standard to be backward compatible with previous standards, specifically 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radio devices.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: سرعات 802.11n أكبر بهواية من سرعات المعيارين الي قبله بناتج نظري أقصاه 600 ميغابت بالثانية.
mt: 802.11n is the fastest standard yet, with a theoretical maximum of 600 megabits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: ما ترك دوفال، المتزوج وعنده ولدين كبار بالعمر، انطباع مؤثر بميلر اللي كان محور القصة.
mt: What left Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, was an impression on Miller, who was the story's focus.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: كَال ميلر  لمن انطلب منه  ينطي رأيه: "مايك  يحجي هواية خلال جلسة الاستماع... كنت أستعد، وعلمود هاي ما سمعت شي من كلامه".
mt: Mike Miller  said he was listening to the hearing... I was ready, and I didn't hear anything he said.
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: وكَال بتصريحه، "راح  نسعى جاهدين لتقليل انبعاثات ثاني أكسيد الكربون لكل وحدة من الناتج المحلى الإجمالي بهامش ملحوظ بحلول عام 2020 عما كان عليه مستوى عام 2005 ".
mt: "We will work hard to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of gross domestic product by a significant margin by 2020 compared to the 2005 level," he said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: ما حدد رقم للتخفيضات، وكَال إنها راح تعتمد على الناتج الاقتصادي للصين.
mt: No discount code was given, and it was said to be dependent on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: شجع البلاد النامية "على تجنب الاسلوب القديم المعتمد على مبدأ أن تلوث أولاً وبعدين تبدي تنظف"
mt: The developing country was encouraged to avoid the old style of "pollute first, clean up later".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: وأضاف بكلامه "مع ذلك، مو لازم أن يجبرون على تحمل التزامات تتجاوز مرحلة نموهم، ومسؤوليتهم وقدراتهم."
mt: "However, they should not be forced to take on commitments that exceed their stage of development, their responsibility and their capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: قدمت مجموعة دراسة العراق تقريرها  الساعة ١٢:٠٠ بتوقيت جرينتش اليوم.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: يحذر من أنه محد يكَدر يضمن أنو أي خطة عمل بهذي  اللحظة بالعراق راح توقف الحرب الطائفية أو العنف المتزايد أو الانحدار نحو الفوضى.
mt: He warns that no plan can guarantee that the current moment in Iraq will stop the sectarian violence, or the growing violence, or the slide toward chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: و يبدأ هذا التقرير بدعوة لإجراء نقاش مفتوح، وتشكيل اتفاق جماعي بالرأي بالولايات المتحدة بشأن السياسة تجاه الشرق الأوسط.
mt: This article begins with a call for an open discussion and a collective opinion in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: ينتقد التقرير بشدة كل جوانب السياسة الحالية تقريباً للسلطة التنفيذية اتجاه العراق، ويشجع على تغيير فوري بهذا الاتجاه.
mt: The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the current executive authority's policy towards Iraq, and urges an immediate change in this direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: أول ما تم ذكره من الـ 78 توصية الخاصة بيها هو أنه لازم اتخاذ مبادرة دبلوماسية قبل نهاية هذا العام لتأمين حدود العراق ضد التدخلات العدوانية وإعادة تأسيس العلاقات الدبلوماسية ويه جيرانه.
mt: 78 recommendations, the first of which is that a diplomatic initiative must be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against aggressive interventions and re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: أعلنت كريستينا فرنانديز دي كيرشنر عضوة مجلس الشيوخ الحالية وسيدة الأرجنتين الأولى ترشحها للرئاسة  مساء البارحة بلابلاتا، وهي مدينة تبعد 50 كيلومتر (أو 31 ميل) عن بوينس آيرس
mt: Current Argentine Senator and First Lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for President last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (or 31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: أعلنت السيدة كيرشنر نيتها الترشح للرئاسة بالمسرح الأرجنتيني، وهو نفس الموقع اللي استخدمته لبدأ حملتها الانتخابية عام ٢٠٠٥ لمجلس الشيوخ بصفتها عضو بوفد مقاطعة بوينس آيرس.
mt: Kirchner announced her intention to run for president in the Argentinean stage, the same site she used to start her 2005 Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires Province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: صارت ضجة بسبب النقاش على مسألة الإنفاق على الإغاثة وإعادة الإعمار بعد إعصار كاترينا؛ واللي وصفه بعض المحافظين الماليين بطريقة فكاهية بأنه "صفقة نيو أورليانز الجديدة لبوش".
mt: There was a stir over the debate on spending on relief and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives described in a humorous way as "Bush's new New Orleans deal".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: النقد الليبرالي لمجهود إعادة الإعمار  ركز على منح عقود إعادة الإعمار للمطلعين بواشنطن.
mt: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focused on the contracts awarded to Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: راح أكثر من 4 ملايين شخص إلى روما للمشاركة بالجنازة.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: كان عدد الحاضرين هواية لدرجة أنه مو كلهم كَدروا  يوصلون للجنازة بساحة القديس بطرس.
mt: The crowd was so large that many people could not get to the funeral Mass in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: تم نصب مجموعة شاشات تلفزيونية كبيرة بأماكن مختلفة بروما  حتى تسمح للجمهور بمشاهدة مراسم الجنازة.
mt: Large screens were set up in various places in Rome to allow the public to watch the funeral.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: بعدد كبير من المدن الإيطالية الأخرى وبقية أنحاء العالم، وخصوصاً بولندا، جرت تجهيزات مماثلة شهدها عدد كبير من الناس.
mt: In a number of Italian cities and other parts of the world, including Poland, similar preparations were witnessed by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: انتقد المؤرخين سياسات مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي السابقة لتركيز موارده على قضايا سهلة الحل، وبالأخص حالات السيارات المسروقة، حتى  يعزز معدل نجاح المكتب.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's previous policies of focusing its resources on easy-to-solve cases, especially car thefts, which have boosted the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: بده الكونغرس بتمويل مبادرة مكافحة الفاحشة بالسنة المالية 2005 وحدد أن مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي لازم يخصص 10 عملاء لمتابعة المواد الإباحية للبالغين.
mt: 2005 federal budget allocated $3 million to the Department of Justice to fund the initiative, and the FBI was directed to assign 10 agents to investigate adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: حقق روبن قفزات أعلى نتيجة بالجولات، 70 ركضة بـ 41 كرة فقط بتسجيل 11 من الأربعة واثنين من الـستات.
mt: Robin Koch scored the highest number of jumps in the rounds, 70 runs with 41 balls only, scoring 11 fours and two sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: قدم ضاربا الكرة المتمركزين  بالوسط، ساشين تيندولكار وراهول درافيد، اداء جيد وأقاما شراكة ربحت  الفريق مية نقطة.
mt: The hosts, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, played well and made a partnership that won the team 6 points.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: لكن من بعد خسارة القائد للتسديد بالبُويبة، حققت الهند فقط 36 جولة بخسارة 7 تسديدات باتجاه البُويبة وانتهت الأشواط.
mt: But after the captain lost the target with the bow, India only scored 36 shots with a loss of 7 shots towards the bow and the innings ended.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: وصل الرئيس الأمريكي "جورج دبليو بوش" إلى سنغافورة صباح يوم 16 تشرين الثاني،  بجولة تستغرق اسبوع بآسيا.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on Monday morning, for a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: كان ياستقباله نائب رئيس الوزراء السنغافوري وونغ كان سينغ وناقش قضايا التجارة والإرهاب ويه رئيس وزراء سنغافورة لي هسين لونج.
mt: He was received by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: بعد أسبوعٍ من الخسائر بانتخابات التجديد النصفي، أخبر (بوش) جمهوره عن توسيع التجارة  بقارة آسيا.
mt: A week after election losses, Bush told his audience about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: وافق رئيس الوزراء ستيفن هاربر على إرسال "قانون الهواء النقي" اللي  حضرته الحكومة إلى لجنة جامعة للأحزاب لمراجعته قبل قراءته الثانية بعد اجتماع مدته 25 دقيقة يوم الثلاثاء ويه زعيم الحزب الوطني الديمقراطي جاك ليتون بمكتب رئيس الوزراء.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the "Clean Air Act" that the government had drafted to a committee of the parties for review before its second reading after a 25-minute meeting on Tuesday, with NDP leader Jack Layton in the prime minister's office.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: طلب لايتون إجراء تغييرات على قانون حماية البيئة للمحافظين خلال اجتماعه مع رئيس الوزراء، وطلب "إعادة صياغة كاملة وشاملة" لقانون حماية البيئة الخاص بحزب المحافظين.
mt: The Environment Secretary has asked for changes to the Environment Bill during a meeting with the Prime Minister, asking for a "complete and comprehensive re-write" of the Conservative Party's Environment Bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: ومنذ أن تدخّلت الحكومة الفيدرالية لاستلام تمويل مشفى ميرسي بدافنبورت بتسمانيا، انتقدت حكومة الولاية وبعض النواب الفيدراليين هذا العمل على انه حيلة بمقدمة الانتخابات الفيدرالية اللي من المقرر أن تجرى بتشرين الثاني.
mt: Since the federal government took over funding of Mercy Hospital in Davenport, Iowa, the state government and some federal lawmakers have criticized the move as a pre-election stunt.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: لكن رئيس الوزراء جون هوارد كَال إنو الإجراء كان فقط من أجل حماية مرافق المستشفى من تخفيض تصنيفها من قِبَل حكومة تسمانيا بمنح 45 مليون دولار أسترالي إضافي.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the move was only to protect the hospital's facilities from a downgrade by the Tasmanian government, which had offered an extra A$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: وحسب آخر تقرير عام، فإن قراءات مستوى سطح البحر تشير لإمكانية حدوث تسونامي، وتم تسجيل نشاط تسونامي مؤكّد بالقرب من باغو باغو ونيو.
mt: According to the latest report, sea level readings indicate a tsunami is possible, and a confirmed tsunami was recorded near Pagopago and Niu.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: و ما وردت تقارير عن وقوع أضرار أو إصابات كبيرة بتونغا، لكن الكهرباء انقطعت بشكل مؤقت، وهالشي منع سلطات تونغا من تلقي تحذير تسونامي الصادر من PTWC.
mt: There were no reports of major damage or injuries in Tonga, but the power was briefly cut, preventing Tonga from receiving a tsunami warning from PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: تم إغلاق 14 مدرسة بهاواي تقع على الخطوط الساحلية، أو قريبة منها، طول يوم الأربعاء، بالرغم من رفع التحذيرات.
mt: 14 schools on Hawaii's coast or near it were closed Wednesday, despite the warnings being lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: رحب الرئيس الأمريكي جورج دبليو بوش بالإعلان.
mt: President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: جوردون جوندرو المتحدث الرسمي لبوش أعتبر تعهد كوريا الشمالية بأنه "خطوة مهمة بإتجاه هدف تحقيق نزع السلاح النووي من شبه الجزيرة الكورية."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "an important step toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: تشكل بالمحيط الأطلسي اليوم ،عاشر إعصار عنده اسم بموسم الأعاصير الأطلسية، وهو إعصار "جيري" شبه الاستوائي.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, forms today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: صرح المركز الوطني للأعاصير إنه بهذي  المرحلة، ما يشكل إعصار "جيري" أي تهديد على اليابسة.
mt: The National Hurricane Center said at this point, "Jerry" poses no threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: قدر سلاح المهندسين الأمريكيين أن 6 بوصات (152.4مل) من الأمطار ممكن أن تخترق السدود الترابية المتضررة سابقاً.
mt: 6 inches (152.4 mm) of rain could breach damaged earthen levees, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: يقع حالياً الجناح التاسع واللي  شهد فيضان يوصل ارتفاعه إلى 20 قدم (6 أمتار) خلال إعصار كاترينا، وارتفع منسوب  المياه لحد ما غمرت السد القريب.
mt: 9th Wing, which was flooded to a depth of 20 feet (6 m) during Hurricane Katrina, is now above the floodwaters.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: تفيض المياه من فوق السد بجزء عرضه 100 قدم (30 متر)
mt: 100-foot (30 m) wide section of the dam is overflowing.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: أعرب آدم كويردين، مدير مجلس العموم، عن إحباطه من عمليات الشطب لمن تكلم ويه ويكي نيوز الشهر الماضي.
mt: Adam Quirk, the Speaker of the House, expressed disappointment in the removal of those who spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: ويلز كذب علينا من البداية. أولاً بالتصرف وكأنو الموضوع صار لأسباب قانونية. وبعدين من خلال التصنع بأنه كان يسمع كلامنا، ولحد ما صار حذف العبارات الفنية.
mt: Wales lied to us from the beginning. First by acting as if the subject was for legal reasons. And then by pretending he was listening to us, until it was deleted.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: أدى عدم رضا المجتمع، إلى الجهود الحالية لصياغة سياسة تتعلق بالمحتوى الجنسي للموقع اللي يستضيف ملايين الوسائط المرخصة بشكل مفتوح.
mt: The community's dissatisfaction led to the current efforts to draft a policy regarding the site's sexually explicit content.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: أما بالنسبة للعمل المنجز فأغلبه نظري، ولكن البرنامج انكتب لمحاكاة الملاحظات اللي تم رصدها من مجرة القوس.
mt: As for the work done, most of it is theoretical, but the program was written to simulate the observations made from the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: يرجع التأثير اللي بحث عنه الفريق إلى قوى مدية وجزرية بين المادة المعتمة بالمجرة والمادة المعتمة بمجرة درب التبانة.
mt: The team's findings are due to the gravitational pull between the dark matter in the galaxy and the dark matter in the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: تماماً مثلما يجذب القمر الأرض ويتسبب بظاهرة المد والجزر، تجذب مجرة درب التبانة مجرة الرامي.
mt: Just as the Moon pulls the Earth and causes tides, the Milky Way galaxy pulls the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: كَدرو العلماء من استنتاج أن المادة الداكنة تأثر على المادة الداكنة الأخرى بنفس الطريقة اللي تـأثر بيها المادة الطبيعية.
mt: The scientists concluded that the dark material affected the dark material in the same way that the natural material was affected.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: توضح تلك النظرية أن معظم المادة المعتمة حول مجرة ما تصير حولها فيما يشبه الهالة، وتكونها جسيمات زغيرة بأعداد كبيرة.
mt: The theory suggests that most of the dark matter around a galaxy orbits it in a halo, and is made up of small particles in large numbers.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: يصعد من المصنع دخان أبيض، وهذا اللي ظهر بالتقارير التلفزيونية.
mt: Smoke is rising from the factory, as reported by TV.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: تشجع السلطات المحلية السكان القريبين من المصنع على البقاء داخل بيوتهم، وغلق مكيفات الهواء، وعدم شرب مياه الحنفية.
mt: Local authorities are encouraging residents near the plant to stay indoors, close their windows, and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: وحسب كلام الوكالة النووية اليابانية، تم رصد سيزيوم مشع وأيودين بالمحطة.
mt: According to the Japanese Nuclear Agency, cesium and iodine were detected at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: وتعتقد السلطات أن هذا دليل على أن الحاويات اللي تحتوي على وقود اليورانيوم بالموقع  ممكن تكون انفجرت وتسربت.
mt: Authorities believe this is evidence that the containers containing uranium fuel at the site may have exploded and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: اكتشف د.توني مول مرض السل شديد المقاومة للأدوية أو ما يعرف بـ (XDR-TB) بمنطقة كوازولوناتال بجنوب إفريقيا.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered a severe drug-resistant form of tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: و صرح بمقابلة أن شكل البكتيريا المتغير الجديد "مثير للقلق ومروع للغاية بسبب معدل الوفيات المرتفع جداً."
mt: "The new shape of bacteria is very alarming and terrifying because of the very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: يعتقد د.مول أنو بعض المرضى من بينهم اثنين من العاملين بالمستشفى من المحتمل يكونون انصابوا بالفيروس داخل المستشفى.
mt: Dr. Mol believes some patients, including two hospital staff, may have contracted the virus within the hospital.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
